(me.getData().items.length == 0){
${../Data1}.setValue(" Info: No Users found for the selected Group , Please try changing the group. " + new Date());
}</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>dbb318d6-8591-4030-8919-61174d4e2ac2</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@width</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>{"isResponsiveData":true,"values":[{"deviceConfigID":"LargeID","value":"100%"}]}</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:viewUUID>64.6b29c1bc-c211-43ce-8fbc-904e6e4d57f7</ns2:viewUUID><ns2:binding>tw.options.userList[]</ns2:binding><ns2:contentBoxContrib><ns2:id>d3170462-1dff-4f75-8117-29e972922cfd</ns2:id><ns2:contentBoxId>ContentBox1</ns2:contentBoxId><ns2:contributions
